name: Wooqer
overview:
Wooqer is an Interaction Optimization Services company that facilitates consumers, brands, retailers and Manufacturers to interact @point of decision. The channels run by Wooqer include:

1) Wooqer - Consumers can find deals, offers online at www.Wooqer.com 2) Pbox- Businesses can create promotions at www.pBox.wooqer.com and publish them for free on ‘Wooqer’. The promotions can also be used at other sites or for offline use. 3) Yumeya- Data is thereafter collected real time from wooqer.com as well as data partners, and analyzed to recommend appropriate promotions to Marketers. 4) OEM - Businesses can make a pitch to associate with Brands, for possible joint promotions, through oem.wooqer.com. 5) Yumeya connects the Marketer to internal decision makers (along with supporting data) as well as agencies/executors for a seamless promotion creation and execution process.
